  • Method Details

    • build

      public void build()
      As it is a factory method it build a block based on the size of arrayOfBlocks without asking the gamer to specified the block. This method recall getBlock

    • build

      public void build​(int domeIdent)
      this method is used by Atlas to build a dome at any case
      Parameters:
      domeIdent - is set to 4 to identify the Dome

    • getBlock

      public Block getBlock​(int blockIdentifier)
      Parameters:
      blockIdentifier - is an int passed by the method Build to build the rightful block
      Returns:
      the block created to Build so that can be added to arrayOfBlocks

    • getBlocksNameInArray

      public java.lang.String getBlocksNameInArray​(int pos)
      //REMEMBER the index is not controlled if is illegal
      Parameters:
      pos - is an index of the arrayOfBlocks
      Returns:
      the name of the block in the list at the specified index

    • getArrayOfBlocks

      public java.util.ArrayList<Block> getArrayOfBlocks()
      Returns:
      the array is a list of the block that was created in a Box

    • print

      public void print()
      this method print out the building of a single box

    • clear

      public void clear()
      this method clear the arrayOfBlock so that the size of the list is equal to zero and the building is !=null
